DOC.brief_summary: Polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) characterize enlarged ovary , menstrual irregularity hyperandrogenism common cause oligoovulatory infertility . Insulin resistance result hyperinsulinemia also common among woman PCOS , along increase risk dyslipidemia , hypertension , diabetes related cardiovascular consequence . Resveratrol natural polyphenol anti-carcinogenic , anti-proliferative pro-apoptotic property , show decrease proliferation steroidogenesis theca cell , emerge potential therapeutic agent PCOS patient . However , little known potential beneficial effect oocyte quality well reproductive outcome , implantation pregnancy rate . The present study evaluate effect resveratrol select biochemical parameter reproductive outcome among patient PCOS undergo vitro fertilization ( IVF ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Resveratrol Metabolic Parameters Oocyte Quality PCOS Patients
DOC.criteria: Women age 18 40 year old . PCOS diagnosis ( accord Rotterdam criterion ) . Mild moderate male factor , tubal factor unknown infertility . Follicle stimulation hormone ( third day menstruation ) > 10 milli international units/L . Endometriosis ( III IV ) . Congenital adrenal hyperplasia . Cushing syndrome . Hyperprolactinemia . Thyroid disease . Androgenic hormone secretor tumor . Patients include trial take either oral contraceptive , steroid medication could modify ovarian function , insulin sensitivity lipid metabolism 3 month onset trial . Severe male factor ( sperm concentration < 5 mill/ml ) . Patients undergo oocyte vitrification avoid hyperstimulation syndrome exclude .
